description: JAWED HABIB is a hair grooming expert and owns Jawed Habib Hair & Beauty Ltd. with salons operating in India and abroad. He runs over 850 salons and 65 hair academies across 115 Indian cities. His work philosophy is science-based styling and not just styling based on products.
name: Jawed Habib
